document_data.name: Neese the Burrower
document_data.mainbody: a wererat, Neese had brown fur.
document_data.Description: As a wererat, Neese had brown fur.
document_data.History: Neese lived in Wheloon Prison with her fellow wererat gang. They were forced from their hideout by the [[Night Brigade]] under [[Storna Harnwood]], who turned it into a [[Temple of Shar (Wheloon)|Temple of Shar]]. After being driven to the exterior of the prison where the [[Purple Dragons]] made their base, Neese helped organize a counterattack with the surviving Rats, specifically targeting the enemy officer [[Karissa the Knife]], who made a habit of dwelling underground and hoarding treasure. Thanks to Neese, [[Master Thief's Hideout|Karissa's hideout]] in the [[Wheloon sewers]] was found and the greedy Master Thief killed.
